name: Electro Konkon
description:
*This game is in development.

This is a Konkon. And it needs energy.

Electro Konkon is a physics-based puzzle game where you try vitalizing low-energy Konkons.

Different Konkons are energized differently. For example:

   Electro Konkon: Energized by an electric current.

   Fire Konkon: Energized by heat.    Earth Konkon: Energized by touching the earth.

Controls: Mouse-Only
